about_the_game:
In "Turtle Riders: Adventure Begins" you will have the chance to see what the main game is about! Take a ride and have a taste of some of the stages, weapons, and modes!

-New weapon : Suriken

-New turtle : Darwin

New reworked endless mode with more enemies and features.

The Beast has awakened and the outpost must be warned! To get there you and your giant turtle have to go through 3 big forests filled with enemies and bosses that will attack you on sight. The path is dangerous so pick your weapons of choice and sharpen your aiming skills in this challenging survival adventure!

Your aim will be challenged

100 unique talents/10 special talents and 5 elemental attacks to make the strongest builds

Gather orbs to unlock new weapons/turtles and upgrade your stats

short_description: Ride giant turtles and aim your weapons at hordes of enemies chasing you while you gather as many resources as you can. Pick your upgrades carefully and create strong builds to survive the long road to the Outpost!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Russian, Hungarian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
